channel.title: Same capes -> can't att each other
channel.description:
Hi, 1.I was wondering how you can code: when a player attacks an other player (whit same cape) it says:"you can't attack that player" and when they haven't got same cape they can just attack each other. 2.how can you code that a player in a certain area can't remove his cape.
can someone pls tell me how to code this things or give me link to a tutorial?

item.title: Same capes -> can't att each other
item.dc:creator: @lol156 lol156
item.description:
@lol156 wrote:

thx can u use (if ((absX >= x && absX <= xxxx && absY >= xxxx && absY <= xxxx)) for area or?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2009, 09:49:42 am[/size][hr]dem it won’t work,
is there other way to code p and p2?

Read full topic
item.source: Same capes -> can't att each other

item.title: Same capes -> can't att each other
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (p.playerEquipment[1] == 1555 && p2.playerEquipment[1] == 1555) { p.resetAttack(); p.frames.sendMsg("You can't attack other players on the same team as you!"); return; }

if (p.inArea && p.removeSlot == 1 && p.playerEquipment[1] == 1555) { p.frames.sendMsg("You can't remove the cape!"); return; }

Read full topic
item.source: Same capes -> can't att each other
